data.comment: In the minute -5, Miguel Herrera (Pachuca) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The first-half is just kicking off.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 2, Roberto Nurse (Pachuca) gets a yellow card.
The match at Estadio TSM Corona has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jose van Rankin, who is down injured.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 6, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
Jose van Rankin is back on his feet again.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Santos Laguna.
Gustavo Cabral (Pachuca) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Santos Laguna drive upfield and Fernando Gorriaran gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Pachuca defender.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Santos Laguna.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Felipe Pardo (Pachuca) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 13, It's a goal kick for the home team in Torreon.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Throw-in Pachuca.
In the minute 15, Santos Laguna awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio TSM Corona.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in their own half.
In the minute 16, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Pachuca surge into the attack at Estadio TSM Corona but Victor Guzmanâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 18, Santos Laguna have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
In the minute 20, Throw-in Pachuca.
Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio TSM Corona.
Free kick Pachuca.
In the minute 22, In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Julio Furch gets his shot on target but fails to score for Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 25, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 27, Throw-in high up the field for Pachuca in Torreon.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 29, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Pachuca.
Throw-in for Pachuca in the half of Santos Laguna.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a throw-in for Pachuca, close to Santos Laguna's area.
In the minute 35, Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Corner awarded to Pachuca.
Victor Guzman is on target to give Pachuca a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 36, Erick Aguirre with an assist there.
Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
In the minute 39, Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
In the minute 41, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, In Torreon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ball safe as Santos Laguna is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Pachuca's half.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Pachuca.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Santos Laguna's Carlos Orrantia attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Pachuca at Estadio TSM Corona.
Pachuca's Oscar Ustari looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio TSM Corona.
Attention is being given to Pachucaâ€™s Oscar Ustari and play has been suspended briefly.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Santos Laguna have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 46, Santos Laguna's Fernando Gorriaran is on target but unsuccessful.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Pachuca's half.
Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 48, Can Pachuca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Santos Laguna's half?
Free kick Santos Laguna.
Free kick for Santos Laguna in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 50, Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 53, Can Santos Laguna capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pachuca's half?
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Pachuca.
In the minute 55, Oscar Murillo puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
Santos Laguna are whistled for offside.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a first substitution, with Victor Davila replacing Roberto Nurse.
In the minute 58, Pachuca make their second substitution with Efrain Orona replacing Victor Guzman.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
Free kick for Pachuca in the half of Santos Laguna.
Pachuca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Adrian Lozano is replacing Walter Sandoval for the home team.
The home team replace David Andrade with Ronaldo Prieto.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Santos Laguna in their own half.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Pachuca in their own half.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 72, Santos Laguna surge into the attack at Estadio TSM Corona but Ronaldo Prietoâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Torreon.
Pachuca needs to be cautious. Santos Laguna have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Pachuca at Estadio TSM Corona.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Santos Laguna.
In the minute 75, Free kick Pachuca.
Can Pachuca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Santos Laguna's half?
Roberto de la Rosa is replacing Victor Sosa for Pachuca at Estadio TSM Corona.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a free kick to Santos Laguna in their own half.
Santos Laguna pushes forward through Carlos Orrantia, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 79, Felipe Pardo for Pachuca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Santos Laguna at Estadio TSM Corona.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a Santos Laguna throw-in in Pachuca's half.
In the minute 80, Santos Laguna have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
Santos Laguna's Fernando Gorriaran attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Pachuca have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Pachuca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 81, Jorge Guillermo Almada is making the team's third substitution at Estadio TSM Corona with Bryan Garnica replacing Carlos Orrantia.
Pachuca have been awarded a corner by Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Santos Laguna goal kick.
Can Santos Laguna get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pachuca's half?
Throw-in for Pachuca in their own half.
In the minute 84, Pachuca's Kevin Alvarez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava awards Santos Laguna a goal kick.
Santos Laguna to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 85, Goal! Pachuca extend their lead to 0-3 through Roberto de la Rosa.
Great play from Victor Davila to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Pachuca.
In the minute 87, In Torreon Santos Laguna attack through Jose van Rankin. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Pachuca goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Marco Antonio Ortiz Nava signals a throw-in for Pachuca, close to Santos Laguna's area.
Throw-in Santos Laguna.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna close to the penalty box.
In the minute 89, Santos Laguna drives forward and Jose van Rankin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Victor Davila (Pachuca) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Santos Laguna in the half of Pachuca.
Free kick for Pachuca in their own half.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Torreon.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pachuca to take a throw-in in Santos Laguna territory.
Santos Laguna awarded a free kick in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-3.
Emmanuel Garcia is on a sub for Felipe Pardo for Pachuca.
The away team have replaced Erick Sanchez with Antonio Figueroa. This is the fifth substitution made today by Paulo Pezzolano.
